column4: hey guys, if I upgrade 11.04 to 11.10 via the Update Manager, will my old software work? Like XBMC and ZFS on Linux?
xmbc is running with 11.10 for zfs i dont know
is there a special reason why you need to update?
I can see the Oneiric dist for ZFS, but not for XBMC
when i update, will it attempt to dwnload from the new dist folder or what...
even for 11.04 there was nothing official in the repos
yeah... I'm using Maverick for XBMC
should be a problem to use it with 11.10 but if there is not really a need of the upgrade...
not really sure what you mean, but my repository for XBMC is ... http://ppa.launchpad.net/team-xbmc/ppa/ubuntu/dists/maverick/
yes thats what i mean with ppa instead of official repo
